snippet: The agency said the expected increase in fuel economy would slow this year, but that it expected carmakers to meet federal standards of 54.5 m.p.g. by 2025.
lead_paragraph: The agency said the expected increase in fuel economy would slow this year, but that it expected carmakers to meet federal standards of 54.5 m.p.g. by 2025.

headline.main: E.P.A. Says Gas Mileage for New Vehicles Hits 24.1 Miles Per Gallon
